landing.bio: I am from Charlotte, North Carolina and pursuing my master’s degree at University of North Carolina at Charlotte in computer science with a GPA of 4.0. I am currently an intern at BatteryXchange company located in Charlotte as Data Analyst and Development Intern. I have worked in Java and C# during my last internship as a software intern at Techlead Software Engineering Private Ltd. I learned two important key things: the impact of agile environment to tackle new problems and how important customer-oriented service is for business. I learned valuable skills in providing reliable, scalable platforms, Innovative with UI/UX, as well as teamwork. Having a degree in Computer science I feel the need to expand my skill set and gain more knowledge and experience and that’s why I am actively looking for a job in software engineering field.

experience.aboutWork: Formulated plans for customer acquisition, attracting and retaining users with leadership.Achieved 45% increase in customer attraction, a 20% increase from previous period.

Established a web application using Angular framework for User Interface and Django framework for web browsable API.Arranged VM instance on GCP and hosted the application.Developed an Image Processing and Analysis system in C# using Visual Studio 2017

education.university: University of North Carolina at Charlotte
education.coursework: Courses:Software System and Design Implementation, Machine Learning, Computer Vision
Courses:Algorithm and Data Structure, Design and Analysis of Algorithm, Software Engineering

interests.paragraphOne: Apart from coding, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. I’ve played sports since high school, so I play soccer, badminton to stay in shape and meet new people in the area. I love traveling, and I try to take a trip every season. Traveling allows me to adapt to new situations and use my organization and planning skills to ensure I have the most fun I can. I try to anticipate possible delays and other interruptions in my travel and always have a list of important contacts.
interests.paragraphTwo: When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows, I am a dedicated sports follower, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements of sports analytics.
